# Limitations and extensions {#limits}

In this final chapter, I discuss limitations to the methods presented
earlier, and extensions for analyzing high dimensional counts. 

* Single cell [@Berge2018] [@Soneson2018] [@Sun2019]
* Long reads [@Soneson2019]
* Genetic variation [@Castel2015] [@Raghupathy2018] [@Srivastava2019Align]
* Microbiome [@Fernandes2014] [@Callahan2016] [@Sankaran2018] [@Willis2019]
